CustomField.description: Defines if the quantity can be modified at a Payee Allowance Record level when related to the Allowance Template. If True, the quantity can be changed.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Defines if the quantity can be modified at a Payee Allowance Record level when related to the Allowance Template. If True, the quantity can be changed.
CustomField.label: Is Quantity Adjustable?
